title: Discover the SECRET Keywords Your Amazon KDP Competitors Don't Want You to Know

tactics.name: Competitor Keyword Reverse Engineering
tactics.description: Use Helium 10 Cerebro to extract keywords from competitor ASINs and filter for low competition opportunities
steps: Paste into Cerebro keyword research tool
Apply filters: 200+ search volume, 1-40 organic rank, <2000 competitors
caveats: Filters may reduce keyword quantity but improve targeting accuracy
source_quotes: we will apply these filters i am interested in minimum searches per month 200
competing products at max i am interested in 2 000

tactics.name: keyword_filtering
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to filter keywords by search volume, rank, and competition.
steps: Search for keywords using ISBN or product title
Apply filters: minimum searches 100, rank 1-40, competing products max 1500
Sort by cerebral IQ score to prioritize low competition
source_quotes: apply some filters like minimum searches 100

heuristics.name: Low Competition Keyword Prioritization
heuristics.condition: If keyword competitors < 2000 and search volume > 200, prioritize for market entry
source_quotes: competing products at max i am interested in 2 000
these are really really low competition keywords

heuristics.name: trend_analysis
heuristics.condition: If keyword trend shows recent growth, prioritize it
source_quotes: check the trend by clicking here

claims.statement: Helium 10 Cerebro can identify 2129 organic keywords per ASIN with proper filtering
source_quotes: we will get a lot of related keywords

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket can identify low-competition keywords with <1500 competitors

niche_patterns.description: Identify underserved niches with specific keyword constraints
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines demographic targeting with competitive advantage
source_quotes: my first coloring book one year old

niche_patterns.example: one year old + coloring book + low competition
niche_patterns.description: Target specific age groups with niche products
